@ RedVanilla : maybe u should read the first comments before you start typing...i NEVER insulted anyone on this website ...in my first comment i said THANK YOU to 20-40...

i've been using utorrent and bittorrent for 3 years...i know how it works.

@killeurkilleur: I have to admit I may have overreacted a little towards you. 
But there is nothing anyone here can do about your slow connection, although I get  your problem due to own expirience.
I believe 2040 stated a few times in the last days that he seeds his torrents for 48 hours at full speed - what more next to getting a good source, encoding and upping can anyone ask for from him? 
After following the comments on 2040s torrents for quite a while I do sympathize with him getting pissed with people mostly caring about their own problems.
So sorry for getting a little harsh with you, I will try to place my criticism more precisely in the future!
